meta.ip: prophet Hirimiyas, started of work rin isip prophet of 627 year(s) of not yet born the Messiah and migpabulus until years 580 of not yet born the Messiah. Te malayat time of serving Hirimiyas, impanpanayan din the people concerning the karereetan coming of nation tenged of sins dan, and of worshipping ran of false gods. And/Now saw of Hirimiyas the katumanan of intagne din of time nasakup e the Yerusalem of Nibukadnisar King of Babylon. Nakita rin again the demolition of city and temple, and the pegkarakep of masulug people other of King dan there to Babylon. Intagne din again the return of people from pegkarakep dan, and the pegbalew-balew of pegpasasindeg of nation there to tapey natahuan here.

ip: nabaad of five: 1.) The calling ki Hirimiyas; 2.) the inlalag of God for of nation of Huda and of teachers here at time of kingdom of Husiyas, Huwakim, Hihuyakin and of Sidikiyas; 3.) the all nabaybayaan of people according to it's written of Baruk sikritari of Hirimiyas, lagkes the various me pegpanagne, and the important what happened of life of Hirimiyas; 4.) the inlalag of Master God concerning the various lapu there nations; and 5.) the other pad story concerning the demolition of Yerusalem, and of pegkaddakep of people going to Babylon.

meta.ip: Hiid‑uwen person Hirimiyas; very rin geyinawei the people din, and igkeepes din the eggukum them. There are me part of document very the love rin of telling concerning the me suffering din tenged because in-umew sikandin of God so that to becoprophets. Iling of hapuy there to heart din the speech of Master God, and not din iya this igkeeles.

Nasulat again of this document coming the time duen e new agreement. And/Now the sika agreement eg-ay-ayaran of people of God and egtumanen dan, minsan pad ware teacher egpasuman-suman them because igsulat man e this there to me heart dan. (31:31-34)

io1: The me pegpanagne concerning the kingdom of Husiyas, Huwakim, Huwakin, and of Sidikiyas
